Name: Ultimate Live Wallpaper
About the game: Ultimate Live Wallpaper is an amazing lightweight AAA live wallpaper engine with stunning 3D animation effects and mouse interaction. Features Support Windows 10 / 8.1 / 8 / 7(with Aero) Support Steam Workshop Support Disable Steam In Preferences Interactive action - react to mouse movements and clicks. Many options - you can change almost every element in the wallpaper settings. Game Mode - will pause wallpaper when you need 100% power for your games. Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. CPU usage as low as 1% FAQ Q: How to download VFX/Themes from Steam Workshop? A: 1. Open theme manage window by click tray icon popup menu item 'Theme', switch to 'Workshop' page to Subscrib Workshop Theme Items. 2. Open wallpaper setting window window by click tray icon popup menu item 'Wallpaper Setting', Click Top-Right coner Download Button to open the Workshop window to Subscrib Workshop VFX Items.
